p: The overall seroprevalence of anti-HAV IgG was 36.2%, and was positively associated with age. Men and those living outside Seoul had a lower seroprevalence than women and those living in Seoul, respectively, and were thus more susceptible to HAV infection, while in the adjusted analysis those working in workplaces with the larger number of health managers were more likely to be anti-HAV IgG positive.
